--- title: TMY: Typical Meteorological Year keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Reading different types of tmy files" ---

read_tmy[source]

read_tmy(filename:Union[Path, str], columns:Optional[list]=None, coerce_year:Optional[int]=None)

Reads TMY files with dates on 5 first cols.

read_pvgis[source]

read_pvgis(filename, coerce_year=None)

Utility function to read PVGIS tmy files
